divs: sighting detailsi was in the back of the house, looking out the window to see how the farm animals were doing when i noticed a red-orange round \ sphere with a white halo floating over the neighbors back yard around the tree top line. the object was moving left and right, up and down. as i called my wife to the window to see the object, i opened the window to listen for noise when i heard the next door neighbor say "what the &&&& is that?". the object did not emit any noise that we could identify. as we watched the object, i said to my wife, keep an eye on the object and i will be right back. i ran to get my cell phone, turned on the camera and headed out the front door to take a picture. as i turned around the corner, nothing was in the sky. my wife said as the door opened, the object took off directly north over my neighbor's land and right above our home a white flash of light occurried at the same time. unfortunely, i was not able to get any pictures or movies of any object.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Smiths Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
